participant_1.background:
I have a book of nursery rhymes for my infant son.
i have 5 brothers and sisters.
I am still single, because I have been on my own for too long, to give my heart away to just anyone.
i teach kindergarten.
i have a job as an it agent.

participant_2.background:
I love to dance because it is a fun way to express myself.
i still love my cat despite all this.
I found a romance novel that my girlfriend would love, but I'm afraid to tell her about it.
I once wrote a song about a local legend in my town and got to perform it at the local music festival.
i have a pond at home with a pet koi named spot.

content.text: Pretty good! I'm just teaching kindergarten and getting ready for the weekend.
That's fun! I love teaching kids! I once wrote a song about a local legend in my town and got to perform it at the local music festival.
Wow, that's awesome! What kind of song was it?
It was about a local ghost who haunts the town. I used to be scared of him, but now I think he's pretty cool.
That's cool! I don't know any songs about ghosts. I have a book of nursery rhymes for my infant son.
Aww, that's cute! I love nursery rhymes! I used to dance around the house singing them when I was little.
Me too! I still dance around the house singing them sometimes.
That's awesome! I love people who are creative and expressive.
Thanks! I do too. I love it when people can let loose and have fun.
Me too! I think it's important to live life to the fullest.
I agree! I love to travel and experience new things.
Me too! I've been to a lot of different places. What's your favorite place you've ever been?
I've been to a lot of great places, but I think my favorite was Paris. It was so beautiful and romantic.
Paris is on my bucket list! I've heard amazing things about it.
